body: Christian Espinosa in Cobertura Digital [es] ranks the top 5 Latin American presidents with the most followers on Twitter. He also shares other information on the use of Twitter by different Latin American administrations.

title: Latin American Presidents to Follow on Twitter

He also shares other information on the use of Twitter by different Latin American administrations.
